Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Asia Cha Am Hotel in Cha-am, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Cha-am Beach, and close to Cha Am Hospital. This hotel is within the region of Santorini Park and Mrigadayavan Palace.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 214 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies. LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This hotel also features babysitting/childcare and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services and luggage storage. This hotel has 8 meeting rooms available for events.
